meanings.definition: A person who drinks alcohol to excess.
meanings.sent1: The toper stumbled out of the bar, clearly having had too much to drink.
meanings.sent2: The party was full of topers who were laughing and singing loudly.
meanings.sent3: The toper tried to dance on the table but ended up spilling his drink everywhere.
meanings.sent4: She was a toper, drowning her sorrows in a sea of alcohol every night.
meanings.sent5: The toper's face was flushed, and his speech slurred as he ordered another round.

meanings.sent1: He would toper every weekend, often waking up with a headache.
meanings.sent2: After a long day at work, she liked to toper to relax and unwind.
meanings.sent3: The friends decided to toper together to celebrate their reunion.
meanings.sent4: The river seemed to toper as it overflowed its banks after the heavy rain.
meanings.sent5: The comedian joked that he would toper if he had to sit through another boring meeting.
